mapper.sql: id, city, weather_day, min_temperature, max_temperature, weather
mapper.select:
select
from t_weather where city = #{weather.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and weatherDay = #{weather.weatherDay,jdbcType=DATE} limit 1

mapper.update:
update t_weather
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weather_day = #{weatherDay,jdbcType=DATE},
min_temperature = #{minTemperature,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_temperature = #{maxTemperature,jdbcType=INTEGER},
weather = #{weather,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_weather set city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weather_day = #{weatherDay,jdbcType=DATE}, min_temperature = #{minTemperature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_temperature = #{maxTemperature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weather = #{weather,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
